tool_description: In just 5 lines of code, your website can have an audio play button for all of its content.
name: Speechify Audio Reader
title: Speechify Audio Reader

api_list.name: Contact us to add Speechify's API to your site
api_list.description: Please visit [https://integrations.speechify.com/](url) for more info on our API and to contact us.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://speechify-audio-reader.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "speechify-audio-reader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://speechify-audio-reader.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "speechify-audio-reader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
